description:
Karara returns, with a bigger crush on Tamama than ever, and a determination to marry him!  Can he ever manage to dissuade her, or is he going to be stuck with an unwanted engagement?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je vais vraiment me marier alors ? / Le Tamama impact bloqué
Tamama Kekkon Suru tte Hontou Desu ka de Arimasu / Tamama Fuuin Tamama Impact de Arimasu
タママ 結婚するって本当ですか であります / タママ 封印タママインパクト であります
